name: COALITION FOR AMERICAN ELECTRONICS RECYCLING
description: Coalition represents the interests of the domestic electronics recycling industry.
sampleDescriptions:
Issues related to E-waste and national security, including counterfeiting parts within the semiconductor industry. 
Issues related to H.R. 917, the Secure E-Waste Export and Recycling Act.
Issues rela
